mapper.select:
select count(t.id) from tbl_merchant_center_operation_log t where t.type = 1 and t.login_name in
#{loginName}
select count(id) from tbl_merchant_center_operation_log where type=1 and login_address='IPError' and operated BETWEEN DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -1 month) and now()
select DISTINCT login_host from tbl_merchant_center_operation_log where type=1 and login_address='IPError' and operated BETWEEN DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -1 month) and now() order by operated desc
mapper.update: update tbl_merchant_center_operation_log set login_address = #{newAddr} where type=1 and login_host = #{ip} and operated BETWEEN DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -1 month) and now()
